sentences.en: From the left atrium the blood passes through the bicuspid valve into the right ventricle.
sentences.cn: 来自左心房的血液通过二尖瓣进入右心室.

sentences.en: From the right atrium, blood is pumped into the right ventricle.
sentences.cn: 然后从右心房开始, 血液再进一步被泵入右心室.

sentences.en: In the lizard, a muscular septum partially divides the ventricle.
sentences.cn: 在虫蜴中, 肌肉质的隔膜把心室部分地隔开.

sentences.en: It is located directly behind the eyes, attached to the third ventricle.
sentences.cn: 它直接位于眼睛的后面, 紧邻第三脑室.

sentences.en: Objective : To analyse the sonographic characteristics of left ventricle - right atrium communication.
sentences.cn: 目的:分析左室 - 右房通道的声像图特征.

sentences.en: Objective To study the change of the diabetic left ventricle function.
sentences.cn: 目的研究糖尿病患者左室功能的改变.

sentences.en: Right Ventricle – to – Pulmonary Artery Conduit Longevity: Is it Related to Allograft Size?
sentences.cn: 右心室至肺动脉导管的寿命: 是否与移植物的大小有关?

sentences.en: Sections from the left ventricle showed diseased tissue.
sentences.cn: 左心室切片显示患病的组织.

sentences.en: Seen here is the explanted heart. Pacemaker wires enter the right ventricle.
sentences.cn: 请看这个移植心脏,起搏器金属丝深入到右心室.

sentences.en: So when the atria contract, the valves sandwiched between the atria and the ventricles open, and the blood in each atrium flows through its respective valve down into a ventricle.
sentences.cn: 所以当你的心房收缩时，夹在心房和心室之间的阀门就打开了，然后每个心房里的血液通过各自的阀门流向心室。

sentences.en: The aortic valve is found between the left ventricle and aorta.
sentences.cn: 主动脉瓣位于左心室和主动脉之间.

sentences.en: The blood regurgitates into the heart ventricle.
The cardiovascular disorders interfere with the emptying of the left ventricle.
sentences.cn: 心血管病人造成左心室郁血.

sentences.en: The posterior borders of the left ventricle and inferior vena cava are well seen.
sentences.cn: 左心室和下腔静脉的后界看得很清楚.

sentences.en: There is choroids plexus anterior in the lateral ventricle.
sentences.cn: 有前脉络丛伸入侧脑室.

sentences.en: When the heart contracts, the chambers become smaller, forcing blood first out of the atria into the ventricles, then from each ventricle into a large blood vessel connected to the top of the heart.
sentences.cn: 当心脏收缩的时候，腔室就变小了，压迫着血液从心房进入心室，然后从每一个心室进入与心脏上部相连的大血管。

sentences.en: You're saying that his left ventricle had been weakened by the lvad malfunction?
sentences.cn: 你声称他的左心室因起搏器故障而开始衰弱?

phrases.tran_cn: 第四脑室；第四脑室外侧孔；第四脑室正中孔

trans.tran_en: one of the two spaces in the bottom of your heart through which blood pumps out to your body
